feed.title: Middleman using Zammu
feed.subtitle: Automatic Deployment of Middleman on Github Pages using Zammu

entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary:
Hello World
This is an example blog using Middleman in Zammu.
Please checkout the tutorial on this blog to know how to set up a Middleman blog on Zammu.

entry.title: Welcome to Ghost
entry.summary:
You’re in! Nice. We’ve put together a little post to introduce you to the Ghost editor and get you started. Go ahead and edit this post to get going and learn how it all works!
Getting Started
Writing in markdown is really easy. In the left hand panel
